string-array.name: product_desc
string-array.item: A stylish two-door roadster with a 1.9L inline-4 engine, known for its elegant design and relaxed driving.
First of the W113 series, featuring a 2.3L inline-6 and the iconic concave “Pagoda” roof.
Legendary coupe with gullwing doors and fuel-injected 3.0L inline-6. A motorsport icon.
Top-tier R107 model with a 5.6L V8, automatic transmission, and luxury features.
Advanced roadster with electro-hydraulic roof, V6/V8/V12 options, and modern safety tech.
Sleek hardtop convertible with electronic braking and V6 to V12 engines.
Lightweight aluminum body, advanced suspension, and powerful AMG variants.
AMG-branded performance roadster with AWD, hybrid options, and cutting-edge tech.
